About Me

Hi, My name is Edmond, a Full Stack Web Developer based in Buffalo, New York currently. I graduated in 2018 with a Bachelors of Science in Business Administration and Management Information Systems from the University at Buffalo in New York. The core of my skill set relies heavily upon the MERN stack, to be able to achieve a smooth and dynamic user experience. Currently some of my primary goals are to improve on my JavaScript and ReactJS capabilities. As well as dabble in some other frameworks like AngularJS to expand my tech stack and knowledge. When I'm not doing web development, I enjoy spending time with my lady and pupper, I also love cooking, fitness, video games, anime, geek stuff, learning about the latest technology, etc.

Contact Me

I'm currently available for work and pursuing new opportunities.

If you have a project in mind that you'd like to get started with, think you require my assistance with something, or just fancy a conversation and a possible chance of coffee, please feel free to get in touch. I will try my best to get back to you as soon as I can!
